promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic lynx normal-type pokemon wearing a opal mask. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Opalinx, a a dynamic basic lynx normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Lunge Out. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "normal" or "Opalinx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, lynx-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This dynamic feline creature is often spotted camouflaging in grassy fields, ready to unleash its exceptional Lunge Out ability on unsuspecting prey.
